SELECT p.productid, p.productname, p.productstock, p.productmaker, p.productprice, pi.productimage FROM product p INNER JOIN productImages pi ON p.productId = pi.productId WHERE
(productName like '%' || #{searchWord) || '%' or productMaker like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%') and
pi.usage='thumbnail' ORDER BY p.productId desc
